pkgmetadata.longdescription: Calculating Bilateral and Multilateral Price Indexes // Preparing a scanner data set for price dynamics calculations (data selecting, data classification, data matching, data filtering). Computing bilateral and multilateral indexes. For details on these methods see: Diewert and Fox (2020) doi:10.1080/07350015.2020.1816176, Biaek (2019) doi:10.2478/jos-2019-0014 or Biaek (2020) doi:10.2478/jos-2020-0037.
